subject: a junit test question in Eclipse: "No tests found with test runner 'JUnit 3'"
msgSnippet: Hi, I have received a Eclipse project from my officemate, including junit test classes. I have created a project in my Linux Eclipse and copied everything into
messageBody:
Hi,

I have received a Eclipse project from my officemate, including junit
test classes. I have created a project in my Linux Eclipse and copied
everything into it. Now, no errors.

But when I run all the junit test within this project, Eclipse says
that "No tests found with test runner 'JUnit 3'". From the manual of
this project, the author was using JUnit Version 3.81.

I do not know inside out of junit. I just use it. If it works, it
works. But now, I got the problem. Could you help me out? Thank you
very much.
